name: Hiragana vs. Katakana
description:
Practice Japanese syllabaries by matching stones with hiragana and katakana characters.

How To Play

Select hiragana or katakana stone by a left mouse button click, move the selected stone with arrows or WSAD keys. 

Stones with unmatching characters block each other while matching stones dissolve on collision. The goal is to match all stones as fast as possible.

When you match all stones, you can enjoy one of the traditional Japanese woodblock prints on the bottom of the play box for a while, and then practice again by clicking on the now active reload button in the bottom right corner.

Source Code @ GitHub
